div.a: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre:
867 Büyükçekmece, c. 30 km. W of Istan- bul (anc. Byzantium), Thrace, 1952 Burial: c. 220 B.C. or later (T) Contents: 184 AR Alexander III: 57 lifetime and post. tetradr. (Amphipolis 6 ANS 1953.150.18 ANS 1953.150.19 ANS 1953.150.17 ANS 1953.150.1 ANS 1944.100.26746 ANS 1944.100.12986 , Maced. 2 ANS 1953.150.16 ANS 1953.150.15 , Greece 2, Mesembria 1 ANS 1954.39.26 , Dionysopolis 1 ANS 1954.39.28 , Asia Minor 1, Magnesia 2, Miletus 1, Byblus 1, Damascus? 1, Ace 1, unc. 36) 19 lifetime and post. dr. (Asia Minor mints) Demetrius Poliorcetes: 2 tetradr. (Amphi- polis 1, unc. 1) Lysimachus: 11 lifetime and post. tetradr. (Perinthus 1, Byzantium 2, Calchedon 1, Cius 2, Cyzicus? 1, Magnesia 1 ANS 1953.150.30 , unc. 3) 2 lifetime dr. (unc.) Byzantium: 3 triob. (4th cent.) 50 tetradr. (Demeter hd./ seated Poseidon) 12 octob. ANS 1953.150.4 ANS 1953.150.7 ANS 1953.150.5 ANS 1954.39.1 ANS 1953.150.6 ANS 1953.150.13 ANS 1953.150.9 ANS 1953.150.11 ANS 1953.150.12 ANS 1953.150.2 ANS 1953.150.8 ANS 1953.150.14 ANS 1953.150.3 ANS 1953.150.18
Calchedon: 11 tetradr. (Demeter hd./seated Apollo) ANS 1953.150.24 ANS 1953.150.23
Attalus I: 2 tetradr. ANS 1953.150.25 Seleucus I: 2 tetradr. (1 Athena in quadriga., 1 Tarsus) Antiochus I: 1 tetradr. (Seleuceia ad Tigrim) Antiochus II: 3 tetradr. (Aegae, Seleuceia ad Tigrim ANS 1953.150.28 , Ecbatana ANS 1944.100.73712 ANS 1953.150.29 ) Seleucus II: 3 tetradr. (Antiocheia 2, Susa 1) Antiochus Hierax: 2 tetradr. (Lampsacus?, Alex. Troas) Antiochus III: 1 tetradr. Unc. Antiochus: 2 tetradr. Ptolemy II: 1 tetradr. Regnal coins ctmk. with prow or Apollo hd. Disposition: New York 36; Seyrig 36; von Aulock 3 (SNG 491-3); Oxford 1 Thompson, ANSMN 6 (1954), pp. 11-34, illus. Additions to published record on file in ANS
